featureType.name: Global_Seamounts_Yesson2020
featureType.title: Global distribution of seamounts based on 30-second bathymetry data (Yesson et al 2020)
featureType.abstract:
An updated prediction seamounts in all oceans. This uses the same methodology as Yesson et al. (2011) (https://doi.pangaea.de/10.1594/PANGAEA.757564), which infers seamount presence by using a series of algorithms to look for conical features on the seabed. It is based on the global bathymetry SRTM v.11.
See https://doi.pangaea.de/10.1594/PANGAEA.921688 for original source
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]
